IndexPage.Title: Welcome to this boilerplate!
IndexPage.Description: Enjoyr the power of NextJS and the simplicity of this boilerplate. You can easily create a multilingual website with this boilerplate.

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description: We've unfortunately encountered an error.You can try to reload the page you were visiting

NotFoundPage.Title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.Description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
